title: Chat not appearing in post or pre game lobby
body:
http://i.imgur.com/zUAxNN2.png

This sometimes happens on both for the same game and sometimes just one of them. It happens around 50% of the time. I submitted a bug report but just posting here since it seems very common and pretty serious. Very annoying when you can't call what you want in the pre game lobby.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is currently a [known issue](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/changelog/e110caea-720b-454b-ab16-633d511243af) and should be resolved soon, remember this client is still in the very early stages of development.
